name: alaskan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Alaska: Native Alaskans are a tiny fraction of a percent of the state's population. He could probably sell snow to an Alaskan.
More examplesFewer examplesAlaskans elected their first female senator.Palin asked the Legislature to give every Alaskan $1,200 as energy cost relief.One-quarter of rural Alaskans do not have convenient access to state courts.

belonging or relating to the US state of Alaska or its people: It is risky to venture alone into the Alaskan wilderness. The Alaskan flag was designed by a 13-year-old schoolboy in 1927.
More examplesFewer examplesSome Alaskan educators prefer a different form of high-tech distance learning. You don't need to be an Alaskan lumberjack to volunteer.I think it is an Alaskan trait to take pride in our work.
